nodes.text: A kath hound were creatures on the planet Dantooine that could be leashed. They were about one meter in height and had cloven hooves. Eventually they became a rare sight on Dantooine, due to many being captured as pets or guard animals.

Captain Cardinal of the First Order believed that in regards to Captain Phasma, General Armitage Hux believed he had a kath hound that could be leashed, but in reality had a rancor waiting for the gate to open.
